text: Need Blake Cox for Boost Juice campaign. Budget around $4,662, looking for 3 x YouTube video, 1 x 15-second TikTok, 3 x Instagram post, 2 x TikTok video, 2 x 2-minute tutorial. 9 week exclusivity from other similar brands. Campaign runs November 2025. Usage rights for 11 months. Engagement period: 4 months.
